objects.text:
• 6.78" Curved AMOLED Display
• 6 GB RAM | 128 GB Storage
• 64MP Rear Camera
• 5500 mAh Battery

product_details.description: NA 6 GB RAM | 128 GB ROM 17.22 cm (6.78 inch) Display 64MP Rear Camera | 13MP Front Camera 5500 mAh Battery Dimensity 7300 Ultimate Processor

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a dynamic tech-themed layout for a 5G gaming smartphone. The left segment highlights text layers arranged vertically, starting with a bold headline (`heading`) and a sharp orange subheading (`subheading`) just below it. A thin accent line (`decorative`) underscores the subheading for added emphasis. A detailed feature list (`description`) follows, describing key product specifications, accompanied by a short tagline (`tagline`) in a digital blue tone. The price (`price`) is prominently showcased in a striking white font, and a vibrant call-to-action button (`cta` and `cta_background`) caps off the section. The right side features a scaled product image (`product_image`) set against a diagonal split background, combining both dark techno-blue and soft orange gradients. The backdrop (`background`) is a complex SVG layered with gradient fills and geometric shapes, giving the design a futuristic and high-tech aesthetic.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Navy (#101820)
- Charcoal Black (#181818)
- Neon Orange (#FF5722)
- Bright Teal (#00BCD4)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a sleek and futuristic color palette, ideal for a tech-forward advertisement banner. Dominant colors include matte black (#1F1F1F) used on the smartphone’s body for a premium, minimalistic look, and vivid orange (#FF5C00) as an accent to highlight innovation and energy. Neon teal (#00FFD1) gives a cyberpunk glow to the skin tone and background, offering contrast and modernity. Bright white (#FFFFFF) text ensures clarity and legibility. The blend of dark and neon hues creates a high-tech, energetic vibe while drawing attention to key elements like the camera and display specs, effectively merging aesthetics and functionality.
